Package demolition

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    allTilesClass  
    App
    This serves as the core manager for the game and functionality which calls upon other classes and extends PApplet.
    Board
    Sets up the backend of the board in a String[][] format which stores the location of all tiles and enemies.
    Bomb
    Extends from GameObject class to create a bomb which will tick for 2 seconds before exploding.
    BrokenWall
    Creates the BrokenWall class which is used to create brokenWall objects that can be stored in an ArrayList for populating the board.
    EmptyWall
    Creates the EmptyWall class which is used to create emptyWall objects that can be stored in an ArrayList for populating the board.
    GameObject
    The GameObject class is the main abstract class which will be inherited from by the PlayerClasses and the allTilesClass for the X and Y coordinates as well as universal getter methods for X and Y
    GoalTile
    Creates the GoalTile class which is used to create GoalTile objects that can be stored in an ArrayList for populating the board.
    Player
    Contains attributes which stores the images for each animation in each direction.
    PlayerClasses
    This abstract class will be inherited from for each entity that is either a player or an enemy.
    readJsonObject
    Class which will read from a JSON file and extract information based on levels, lives and time and put values into a HashMap which will be used for map loading.
    redEnemy
    Creates the redEnemy object which extends the PlayerClasses and implements the playerMovement interface.
    SolidWall
    Creates the SolidWall class which is used to create SolidWall objects that can be stored in an ArrayList for populating the board.
    timer
    Creates the timer class which loads the images as well as keeps track of the game time.
    yellowEnemy
    Creates the yellowEnemy object which inherits attributes from the playerClasses class for tick().
